subject: World Cup 2014 (Soccer)
Soccer
organizations: United States Men's National Soccer Team
lead_paragraph: The men’s national team beat Turkey, 2-1, on Sunday in a game that gave Coach Jurgen Klinsmann an opportunity to find the best starting lineup for the Americans’ World Cup opener on June 16.
snippet: The men’s national team beat Turkey, 2-1, on Sunday in a game that gave Coach Jurgen Klinsmann an opportunity to find the best starting lineup for the Americans’ World Cup opener on June 16.
